item.title: Considerations 2
item.description:
Considerations_2
Twilight Courier

When I think of the near forgotten dream of someone quite dear to me
I imagine a conversation with you
Your advice and patient listening

And so
Here again
The thoughts of the sublime
And a missed opportunity

Return
After a long voyage
Once again
In study of the maps and charts
Still in search of those expressions found not of mortal substance

item.title: Dinosaur_hunger_44100
item.description:
Twilight Courier
Darkweb User$.Ribbons. Post Subject - aanimals

Icosaalopex – unfrequent
The vault Unhinged
Unhindering
And Uncommon

Now
Checklist
Animal Whistle - 44100 Hz
Common Format
Coincidence?
Not So
An animal whistle
CryptoLupine
For what else are they?
Vittles

Checklist
Red Plastic Box
Iodine
Radiotrophic Fungi
Tweezers
Binding Gauze

Checklist
Satchel – nanotech in order, 50000kg
10,000,000 RMB

The prey beyond the Gate

item.title: Frustrated
item.description:
Frustrated
Twilight Courier

Though your frustrated if you express it in this way
you will find yourself no longer a person
no longer capable of love
and having the certainty that your soul was lost along the way

item.title: Ghosts Of The Fogg
item.description:
Ghosts Of The Fogg
Twilight Courier

the tides stop
like they do
every year
bringing The Fogg
and the ghosts to appear

haul in your boats
and stay close to shore
harboring grief
as The Fogg draws near

bar the doors shut
staying warm by the fire
and rest easy
in the good company of those whom you hold dear

mad drunken howls
the guards at their post
ringing the bells
for the lonely and lost

send out the candles
on small wooden boards
to light up the coast
as the tides come to a pause

say your prayers that The Fogg doesn’t stay
over our country
on this solemn day

item.title: Scattered
item.description:
Scattered
By Twilight Courier

Looking into the origins of the subculture
She had lost her soul long ago to their marketing schemes
And noticing her hips as her dress fell everywhere but off
He then withdrew into the hermitage to eat a healthy diet of oats and fungus
But not before committing to spectacular changes
That would bring the evocation of gentle strings
Screaming
Like a noxious renegade
Shifting gears
To try and deal with the pandemic blues
Until his second departure would mean leaving once more

item.title: The Dragons of the Sea
item.description:
The Dragons of the Sea
Twilight Courier

The dragons of the sea
Once soared in majesty
beneath the clouds
Imagination,
wonder of the world
their grace and sweeping waves

the plastic seas, the dragons choke
corpses on the beach
littered with waste
ancient form
skeletons rotting away
consuming refuse and debris

Consequence of the disposable
The beauty of the world
What is granted to us
Thrown Away

item.title: About
item.description:
Written in Go, Hugo is an open source static site generator available under the Apache Licence 2.0. Hugo supports TOML, YAML and JSON data file types, Markdown and HTML content files and uses shortcodes to add rich content. Other notable features are taxonomies, multilingual mode, image processing, custom output formats, HTML/CSS/JS minification and support for Sass SCSS workflows.

Hugo makes use of a variety of open source projects including:

  • https://github.com/yuin/goldmark
  • https://github.com/alecthomas/chroma
  • https://github.com/muesli/smartcrop
  • https://github.com/spf13/cobra
  • https://github.com/spf13/viper

Hugo is ideal for blogs, corporate websites, creative portfolios, online magazines, single page applications or even a website with thousands of pages.

Hugo is for people who want to hand code their own website without worrying about setting up complicated runtimes, dependencies and databases.

Websites built with Hugo are extremelly fast, secure and can be deployed anywhere including, AWS, GitHub Pages, Heroku, Netlify and any other hosting provider.

Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

item.title: Callen Duel - Bearers Of The Marigold now released
Solid-State Physics
item.description:
Solid-State Physics
Twilight Courier

She was a Woman who inspired poetry
So it is no surprise that her departure inspired a poem

Her influence remained
An elegant sadness in the approach
A change in technique
Something the great masters of the art all knew

item.title: Summer's End Storm
item.description:
Summer's End Storm
Twilight Courier

the city is not as it used to be
a cowardly man flees during the storm
his dog moves frantically, but certainly with purpose to find the coward who had abandoned him

and from the bridge one of the most beautiful views of the hills
and from the bushes comes a vagrant stumbling from the recent injection
and from the fallen trees the path is blocked

the
thunder booms
in realization

item.title: When I Set Off I Was A Troubled Man
item.description:
When I Set Off I Was A Troubled Man
Twilight Courier

When I set off I was a troubled man
And I only returned with different troubles

I realized the blight of compassion dying
That staying would take my soul
And in preservation of empathy
I left once again, quickly and without regret
